title: Wife file for divorce when in rehab I need a little time to find a lawyer. Can I file a counter claim?
question: She made false statements about me and had an affair with best friend.. Can I fight to keep house and car..
answers:
I understand that this is a difficult time for you but you are focused on the wrong things. The reasons for the divorce are immaterial. Get yourself a divorce attorney ASAP and they will walk you through the process.

Best wishes,

Jason Beahm
Beahm Law
www.californiacleanrecord.com
www.beahmlaw.com

No. California is a no-fault divorce state. Whether your spouse had an affair has nothing to do with the division of property and debts. You're entitled to your equal share of the community property and debts.
